title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 505.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 505.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of services which operates or proposes to operate a
program certified or funded by the Office of Mental Health. (b) This Part applies to facilities and
programs operated by the Office of Mental Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
505.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
